name: Blue Screen
description:
Travel between cyberspace and the real world. All art, code, music, and sound effects were made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 30. The theme was Connected worlds.

Controls

Real World - WASD to Move, Q/E to Lean, Shift to Crouch, and Click to Interact

Cyberspace - WASD to move, Q/E to Roll, and Click to Shoot
